Analysis of RNA-seq data generated from three human cell line (HeLa, HEK293 and SH-SY5Y) where autophagy was induced through two ways: mTOR inhibition and starvation.

Control samples were collected at 0 and 30 hrs, while treated samples were collected at 1, 15 and 30 hrs.
